name: podsync
tagline: A tool that converts YouTube channels into podcast feeds
description: Podsync is a self-hosted YouTube-to-podcast converter that turns YouTube channels into RSS feeds. It downloads and serves audio files, making content available in podcast apps.

features.title: Youtube To Podcast
features.description: Convert YouTube channels and playlists into podcast RSS feeds

features.title: Audio Extraction
features.description: Extract audio from YouTube videos and serve as podcast episodes

features.title: Rss Feed Generation
features.description: Create standard RSS feeds compatible with all podcast apps

features.title: Automatic Updates
features.description: Monitor YouTube channels for new videos and add them to feeds automatically

features.title: Multiple Channels
features.description: Convert multiple YouTube channels into separate podcast feeds

features.title: Quality Selection
features.description: Configure audio quality and format for downloaded content

features.title: Episode Metadata
features.description: Include video titles, descriptions, and thumbnails in podcast feeds

features.title: Storage Management
features.description: Automatically delete old episodes to manage disk space usage
